name: RemoteWorkRadio
0:
”Alexa, open Remote Work Radio”
”Alexa, ask Remote Work Radio for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start Remote Work Radio”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: remote work radio
des: Listen to the latest podcast about Remote Work and the Rural Online Initiative produced by Utah State University. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
